definitions.definition: Any American marsupial of the family Didelphidae in the order Didelphimorphia .
Any of the marsupials in several families of the order Diprotodontia of Australia and neighboring islands.

main_definition: Any American marsupial of the family Didelphidae in the order Didelphimorphia .
secondary_definitions: Any of the marsupials in several families of the order Diprotodontia of Australia and neighboring islands.
